description:
Kotori is a very cheerful girl with the ability to manipulate computers. She is protective and fiercely loyal to Yuma, as she admires his unwavering will and determination of constantly challenging himself. Despite the fact that Kotori sometimes gets annoyed by Yuma`s naivety and childish outbursts, she appears to harbor a deep crush on him.
Source: Yu-Gi-Oh Wikia
name: Mizuki Kotori
